Html:
We are UK based company looking for call centers for our Internet (VoIP) phone services sales  campaign, We need centers with setup of 25- 50 seats and predictive dialer, to dial USA in normal business hrs plus weekends and holidays, Leads and training material will be provided by us. Our payout is the best in the industry and will be paid by wire transfer on monthly basis. Interested centers are requested to contact with their profiles.

Contact  - admin@eshreya.com
